About The Company

Since 1990

In the industry

7 timezones

We work worldwide

From sourcing the world’s finest estate-grown Mandeheling coffees in the remote, mist-shrouded volcanic highlands of North Sumatra, and in doing so ensuring that farmers are treated and paid fairly, to helping a three-generation Indian premium cashew processing enterprise grow to the next level while investing to build strong local communities, MarthaMax Corporation is committed to people and planet first through social enterprise trust. Through legacy-building we find great fulfillment and do it well by creating added value in all that we do.

Our Love Story

After years of working together, placeholder content starts and continues. We value our reputation that’s why we give only realistic promises; we are not guided by short-term gains and keep transparent records on our activities.
